content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4213.4 - Eligible and ineligible uses of loan funds

State Regulations
(a) Assistance from the loan fund may be
sought and used for: (1)
except as prohibited
by subdivision (b) of this section, new construction, renovation or leasehold
improvements; (2)
the acquisition
of land or buildings; (3)
the
acquisition of machinery and equipment; (4)
the acquisition of an ongoing
business; (5)
the acquisition of a
franchise of a nationally recognized corporation; (6)
working capital; and
(7)
deposits in connection with linked
deposit loans and loan guarantees. (b) Assistance from the loan fund shall not
be used for any of the following purposes: (1)
refinancing, retiring or liquidating
existing debt; (2)
participation in
the financing of nonpublic contracts for residential construction, renovation, or development construction, unless pursuant to a government-sponsored
project; (3)
payment of any tax
arrearages; and
(4)
payment of
employee benefit arrearages. Notes
